paragraphs.text:
%angular

Objective

Register external data sets sourced from files hosted on Hadoop File System (HDFS).

Utils

ComputeDB Cluster Monitor
Maven Repository
Spark-Packages.org

Other Data Sources

Local Files(LFS)
Hadoop (HDFS)
Amazon S3(AWS)
Google Cloud(GCS)
Microsoft Azure (ADLS)

paragraphs.title: Step 1 : Select file format of stored data.
paragraphs.text:
%snappydata
{
    import org.apache.zeppelin.interpreter.QueryBuilder._
    val fileFormat = z.select("FileFormat",getFileFormats.toSeq).asInstanceOf[String]
    z.put("dataSource",hdfs)
    z.put("fileFormat",fileFormat)
    z.run("20191009-092611_933058772")
}

paragraphs.title: Step 2 : Deploy Dependencies
Step 3 : Supply access credentials and file format parsing options
paragraphs.text:
%snappydata
{
    import org.apache.zeppelin.interpreter.QueryBuilder._
    
    val dataSource = z.get("dataSource").asInstanceOf[String]
    val fileFormat = z.get("fileFormat").asInstanceOf[String]
    val dParams = parseAndRender(getDataSourceParams(dataSource),z)
    val fParams = parseAndRender(getFileFormatParams(fileFormat),z)
    configureDataSourceEnvParams(sc,dParams,dataSource)
    if(verifyParams(dParams,fParams)) {
        val path = getPathFromParams(dParams,dataSource)
        printHTML(List(path),"Path based on provided variables")
        z.put("dataSourceParams",dParams)
        z.put("path",path)
        z.put("fileParams",fParams)
    }
}

paragraphs.title: Step 4 : Register External Table in catalog
